title: Please help my nephew get a fighting chance at life.
selftext:
My nephew is fighting for life and his family cannot afford the treatment costs. I don't usually share things like this, but anyone who can, please help us.

[https://www.impactguru.com/fundraiser/help-baby-of-tejasri](https://www.impactguru.com/fundraiser/help-baby-of-tejasri)
